name: Perfect Pie
description:
!! PLAY IN FULLSCREEN !!

You are a rocket launcher, defending your pie-maker engine from bad ingredients.
Everything you think should not be in a pie must be destroyed to prevent the shutdown.

A game for the Trijam #160
Theme was " Don't turn it off"
Made in 4 hours

Transarc : Dev

Toudji : Art

Tibaud : Art

Epercatap : Sound / Music
